credit_line: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
title: American Airlines:  To New York
description: Image consists of abstractlyu rendered New York skyscrapers dominating the center.  At lower right, the American flag hangs from a building.  The American Airlines logo followed by the words "TO NEW YORK" are at the bottom left.  The words "AMERICAN AIRLINES" in bold block print are staggered at the top of the poster.
name: Poster
